mapper.select: SELECT ap.attendance_approval_no approvalNo , ap.attendance_approval_begindate begindate , ap.attendance_approval_enddate enddate , ap.create_date createDate , ap.update_date updateDate FROM attendance_approval ap LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON e.employee_no = ap.employee_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common name ON name.`code` = ap.attendance_approval_type LEFT OUTER JOIN common status ON status.`code` = ap.attendance_approval_status WHERE ap.use_yn = 1 AND name.name = '연차' AND DATE_FORMAT(ap.create_date, '%Y-%m') = #{month}
